badge_template_activities.title: Very few managers, directors and senior executives have the word innovation strategy in their title, yet they regularly encounter thorny challenges which could benefit from being approached in new ways, with fresh eyes. In these cases, cultivating innovative thinking takes specific know-how – tools, techniques and approaches – to systematically pull the levers which enable the creativity and insights to flow.

98c6ac29-7f0e-4a88-86e2-30757f0c8d66.description: Participants will have the ability to innovate, address constant change and solve increasingly complex problems using practical advice and tools to manage the innovation process. Critical communication skills, accelerate career success and are essential to the cohesive and prosperous operation of any organization. Learning to manage critical situations has become an essential skill to ensure that public sector organizations have the resilience to adapt and succeed. Apply all the skills learned in this program to identify issues and opportunities in public sector management.

It provides the management-level skills and understanding of Lean Six Sigma practices such as critical thinking, data analysis, change management and leadership. An individual with Black Belt certification will be able to become the champion of a Lean Six Sigma program and help the organization meet its key goals.

They will be able to network with peers in municipalities across the country, and build on their leadership style.
